sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,TRANS_DATE ,TRANS_AMT ,ORDER_ID ,CARD_ID ,SUB_MER_ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,MER_ORD_ID ,TRANS_MER_ID ,DATE ,SYS_REF_NUM ,SYS_TRA_NUM ,RETURN_CODE ,TRANS_TYPE ,RESERVED1 ,RESERVED2 ,RESERVED3 ,RESERVED4 ,RESERVED5 FROM UNILATERAL_ORDER_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND UNILATERAL_ORDER_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(TRANS_DATE) Like '%'||(#trans_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMT) Like '%'||(#trans_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_ID) Like '%'||(#card_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_sys_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ORD_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_ord_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DATE) Like '%'||(#date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SYS_REF_NUM) Like '%'||(#sys_ref_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SYS_TRA_NUM) Like '%'||(#sys_tra_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RETURN_CODE) Like '%'||(#return_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED4) Like '%'||(#reserved4:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED5) Like '%'||(#reserved5:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM UNILATERAL_ORDER_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND UNILATERAL_ORDER_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(TRANS_DATE) Like '%'||(#trans_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMT) Like '%'||(#trans_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_ID) Like '%'||(#card_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_sys_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ORD_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_ord_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DATE) Like '%'||(#date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SYS_REF_NUM) Like '%'||(#sys_ref_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SYS_TRA_NUM) Like '%'||(#sys_tra_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RETURN_CODE) Like '%'||(#return_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED4) Like '%'||(#reserved4:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED5) Like '%'||(#reserved5:VARCHAR#)||'%'
